name: Gravity Maze (SpellMender)
description:
Made over Thanksgiving Weekend for Game Off 2019 game jam

Theme: Leaps and BoundsLeaps - Sometimes changing gravity requires a "leap" of faithBounds - Shifting gravity gives new perspective on the "bounds" set by the maze walls

Use gravity to your advantage to solve the maze!

Controls:
[AD] - Left/Right
[W]  - Jump
[QE or Arrow Keys]  - Gravity Shift (Left/Right)Can only shift gravity once per jump
Links:
Discord - https://discord.gg/Rab99M4
Twitter - https://twitter.com/_NinjaMage
Reddit - https://www.reddit.com/u/SpellMender

Leave a comment below! I'm thinking about taking this idea further.
